Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at Drexel/51st
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Drexel, 47th, and Lake Park, due to fire department activity near Drexel/51st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, Drexel, 47th, and Lake Park, due to fire department activity near Drexel/51st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express Temporary Reroute at Drexel/51st
ShortDescription: 2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 55th, Lake Park, and 47th, due to fire department activity near Drexel/51st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both direction via Cottage Grove, 55th, Lake Park, and 47th, due to fire department activity near Drexel/51st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Dempster-Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Dempster-Skokie. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
